name: df-toplnd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ctoplnd, crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cv(s2)))))))))
comment: A topology is _Lindelöf_ iff every open cover has a countable subcover. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Jan-2015.)
